catalog_info.title: Livestock Census - Madhya Pradesh
catalog_info.description: This dataset provides a comprehensive count of livestock across districts in Madhya Pradesh. It is valuable for AI modeling related to agricultural planning, resource allocation, and predicting livestock-related economic trends.

provenance.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
provenance.department: Department of Animal Husbandry and Dairying
